summary: Request to simplify Client/Worker initialization in the Ruby SDK. This issue was part of a previous SDK version and is no longer applicable following the SDK rewrite.
userImpact: Simplifying initialization would reduce complexity for users setting up Temporal clients and workers.
resolutionDetails: The SDK underwent a rewrite/refresh and this issue applied to a previous version that is no longer applicable.
keyQuote: The SDK is undergoing a rewrite/refresh and this issue applied to a previous version and is no longer applicable
